divs: Sighting Details3 days ago,4-22-10 at 3am I noticed 2 ping ponging orbs in my bedroom.Thinking that someone was trying to get into my house,at first they looked as if they were purple flashlights,but when I saw them doing the up down,sideways to sideways,my eyes saw round objects the size of a silver dollar,as soon as I went to get a closer look,one shot a beam of white light in my eye.this is during a poltergiest type experiance I've been going thru since 2004,missing items,missing time,purfume smell in house, tiny marks on walls,mirrows,doors,car,ect.what the hell are they?All I know is my thinking is redirecting towards the supernatual,I checked-out all the books,so now I got my 1st PC.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in La Palma
There were no other sightings in La Palma on or around April 22nd 2010
Summary: Purplish/white balls of light in my dark bedroom.
